GT.content: looking for “noon,” origin w/out shadow, w/out dialectical negativity, not any madness: sleepwalk in the vicinity of the impossible
reason for non-forgiveness [re: “Counterfeit Money”] convokes a whole philosophy whose high noon (sun w/out shadow) is very elliptical

OTO.content: noon of life is an instantly vanishing limit, the instant Nietzsche says, “yes, yes, I and I who recite my life to myself”
alliance in which Nietzsche seals/forges his signatures, and simulates them: demonic neutrality of midday delivered from the negative and from dialectic

CIN.content: pure burning light: no sign of passage, pure consuming destruction, noon w/out contrary
